```{r}
x5 <- c("台北市","新北市","高雄市")
greatTaipei <- c("台北市","新北市")

x5 %in% greatTaipei

```

```{r}
!(x5 %in% greatTaipei)
```

```{r}
y5 <- c("女","男","女")

y5=="女"

```

```{r}
!(y5=="女")
```

```{r}
x5 %in% greatTaipei
y5=="女"
(x5 %in% greatTaipei) & (y5=="女")
#同時來自大台北又女性
```

```{r}
which((x5 %in% greatTaipei) & (y5=="女"))
```

```{r}
(x5 %in% greatTaipei) | (y5=="女")
```

```{r}
which((x5 %in% greatTaipei) | (y5=="女"))
```

```{r}
xor(x5 %in% greatTaipei, y5=="女")
```

```{r}
which(xor(x5 %in% greatTaipei, y5=="女"))
```

```{r}
library(readr)
exData2 <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/exData2.csv")
date <- as.character(exData2$期間)
currency <- exData2$幣別
exchangeRate <- exData2$匯率
```

請把date的class存成date clas

```{r}
class(date)
```

```{r}
library(lubridate)
date <- ymd(date)
```

```{r}
class(date)
```
1980-08-01之後的資料有多少筆
```{r}
isAfter19800801 <-
  date >= ymd("1980-08-01")
isAfter19800801
```

```{r}
sum(isAfter19800801)
```
幣別為“歐元USD/EUR”的資料有多少筆
```{r}
head(currency)

```

```{r}
head(currency=="歐元USD/EUR")
isEur <- currency=="歐元USD/EUR"
```

```{r}
sum(isEur)
```
有將currency轉乘 factor class
```{r}
currency <- as.factor(currency)
```

```{r}
isEur <- currency=="歐元USD/EUR"
sum(isEur)
```
exchangeRate有多少筆NA
```{r}
isexchangena <- is.na(exchangeRate)
sum(isexchangena)
```
